{"id":1437698599,"question_id":223,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1730243649,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1437698599/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Rectangle Area","memory":"9.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int computeArea(int ax1, int ay1, int ax2, int ay2, int bx1, int by1, int bx2, int by2) {\n        int area1 = (ax2-ax1)*(ay2-ay1);\n        int area2 = (bx2-bx1)*(by2-by1);\n\n        //iou\n        // x overlap\n        int left = max(ax1, bx1);\n        int right = min(ax2, bx2);\n        int overlapX = right -left;\n        //y overlap\n        int top = max(ay1, by1);\n        int bottom = min(ay2, by2);\n        int overlapY = bottom - top;\n        int ret = area1+area2;\n        if(overlapX >0 && overlapY > 0)\n            ret = ret - overlapX * overlapY;\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"rectangle-area","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
